texts.name: Stella
texts.biography: Stella spent much time in libraries exploring ancient manuscripts from sunken ships in the whirlpools. It was for this reason that she quickly became a powerful magician. She primarily focused her studies on the spell Haste. Hearing about this her abilities, Raven awarded her the rank of admiral in his mission

specialty.name: Haste
specialty.description: Casts Haste spell with increased effect, based on the level of the target.
